about_the_game:
Enjoy the Music Soundtrack of Seduce Me the Otome, composed by the brilliant Christopher Escalante!

Guest talents are AbilityPhoenix, Michael Kelly, and Michaela Laws

TRACKS

1. [OP] Chained The Monster (feat. Ability Phoenix) 01:30
2. Menu Theme 01:44
3. School Day 02:06
4. Strange New Place 01:13
5. A Certain Uncertainty 02:13
6. Calm Mystery 02:03
7. Creepy Things 02:01
8. A Million Stories 01:28
9. Sugar 02:25
10. Spice 02:30
11. Andrew 03:05
12. Demons 02:37
13. Diana 02:30
14. Smart James 03:03
15. Sexy Erik 03:43
16. Strong Sam 03:03
17. Silly Matthew 02:42
18. Silent Damien 02:30
19. Flashbacks 01:53
20. [ED] Fly High (feat. Michaela Laws) 04:24
21. [OP] Chained The Monster (instrumental) 01:30
22. [ED] Fly High (instrumental) 04:24
